tasks.coverage: rm -rf ./cov && deno test --allow-net --allow-read --parallel --coverage=cov && deno coverage --detailed ./cov && rm -rf ./cov
tasks.coverage-list: rm -rf ./cov && deno test --allow-net --allow-read --parallel --coverage=cov && deno coverage ./cov && rm -rf ./cov
tasks.test: rm -rf ./docs/.vitepress/dist && rm -rf ./docs/.vitepress/cache && deno run -A npm:madge --circular --extensions ts ./ && deno test --allow-net --allow-read --parallel && deno publish --dry-run --allow-dirty && deno lint && deno task docs-build
tasks.docs-dev: deno task typedoc --watch & deno task vitepress-dev
tasks.docs-build: deno task typedoc && deno task vitepress-build
